description:
The investment seeks to provide total return.
 The fund is an actively managed exchange-traded fund ("ETF") that seeks to achieve its investment objective, under normal circumstances, by obtaining investment exposure to an actively managed portfolio consisting of equity securities of cryptocurrency-related and other blockchain technology-related companies. It may invest indirectly in bitcoin exclusively through investments in the Bitcoin Investment Trust ("GBTC"), a privately offered, open-end investment vehicle. The fund is non-diversified.
